alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Galveston; Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 9:52PM CDT until June 21 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Galveston County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... Eastern Matagorda County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smith Point to Santa Fe to 6 miles west of Holiday Lakes, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Lake Jackson, Angleton, La Marque, Freeport, Clute, Hitchcock, West Columbia, Surfside Beach, Galveston Pier 21, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Danbury, Bayou Vista, Oyster Creek, Jamaica Beach and Tiki Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
